title: Tech Corp Office Break-in
description: Night-time break-in at Tech Corp headquarters, 3rd floor executive office. Suspect forced entry through window, searched desk and filing cabinets, exited through emergency door.
evidence_summary: Black leather glove found near desk

timeline_events.event: Night janitor confirms office was locked and secure
Delivery driver notices suspicious white sedan
Neighbor sees someone exit through back
Security guard sees suspect running through parking lot
